WorkItem.Description: Thumbnail shell extension sample for pre-Vista operating systems.

Comments.Message:
Hello mladjenovic,

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to develop the Thumbnail Shell extension for XP.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Team supports Windows Vista and later operation system. So XP is out of the range, we hope you can get the samples. And we have some Thumbnail Shell extension samples for Vista and later, you can refer the following link:
http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/CppShellExtThumbnailHandler-32399b35.

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
